Title: Student Management System Slow
Description: PowerSchool taking 5+ minutes to load student records. Affects grading and attendance entry.

Title: Email Access Issues
Description: Cannot access school email through Outlook. Getting authentication errors. Password reset didn't resolve issue.

Title: Projector Display Problems
Description: Smart board projector showing distorted colors and flickering. Tried different input sources, issue persists.

Title: WiFi Connection Issues in Library
Description: Students unable to connect to school WiFi network. Connection drops frequently. Affects approximately 15 devices.

Title: Computer Won't Start in Room 101
Description: Desktop computer in classroom 101 won't power on. Power button LED is not lighting up. Checked power cable connections.
